name: Farmer Rabbit's Wild Ride
description:
Dear Farmer Rabbit,

An Evil Veg-Romancer has taken over the kingdom with their army of necro-crops. We believe their next target is your carrot patch.

Good Luck, it's Harvesting Time.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Click / Hold Left Click for Shooting

Tips:

Pick up powerups for quick burst to your fire rate

Credits:

m5x7 Font by Daniel Linssen (https://managore.itch.io/m5x7)
